title: Splash page
author: JGray
text:
A splash page is a single panel page that is designed to highlight action or a situation. I tend to use the splash page when I'm showing off a cool move on the part of our heroes, inspiring wonder, or introducing a new concept.

Or, in this case? A new toy...
